actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 93-27.

official_title: Resolution authorizing the Committee on Education and Labor to conduct certain studies and investigations.

summary.text: Authorizes, effective January 3, 1973, the Committee on Education and Labor, acting as a whole or by subcommittee to conduct full and complete studies and investigations within its jurisdiction. Requires the committee to submit to the House, not later than January 2, 1975, a report on the activities of that committee during the Congress ending at noon on January 3, 1975.

titles.title: Resolution authorizing the Committee on Education and Labor to conduct certain studies and investigations.
